short_summary: PURCHASE OF A SNOW REMOVAL TRUCK EQUIPPED WITH A DUMP BODY, A FRONT SNOWPLOW AND TWO (2) WINGS, INCLUDING DELIVERY AND TRAINING
description: TRANSPORT CANADA requires that a RFP be issued for the acquisition of a snow removal truck equipped with a dump body, a front snowplow and two (2) wings, including delivery and training.Each vendor will provide a quote (Cost plus freight) for the requested equipment as specified in the RFP document. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerees/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.

# T3033-2324KD-2 - Request for Proposal

## Requested Goods or Services

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested suppliers to tender for the acquisition of a plow truck equipped with a dump body, front snowplow, and two (2) wings for snow removal, including delivery and training, for the Department of Transportation (TC).

## Key Details

* **Tender Reference**: WS3759640992-Doc3884119056
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-20T14:00:00
* **Publication Date**: 2023-02-21
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: (TBD)
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-06-30
* **Tender Status**: Expired

## Trade Agreements

This tender is eligible for the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

## Delivery and Training Details

The successful bidder will be required to provide delivery and training services for the snow removal truck located in Blanc-Sablon, Québec, Canada.

## Notice and Selection Criteria

The notice for this tender can be found on the Ariba Discovery portal. The selection criteria for this tender include variations or combinations of the above methods.
